sub_title: Interim Product Manager / Product Owner @ DPG Recruitment
summary:
Pragmatic enthusiastic product manager always looking for a data driven problem. Collecting user problems from internal & external stakeholders to get the full understanding of the problem

With over 14 years of experience in product management of which 8 in Retail, 4 in B2B and 2 in Travel

My focus is on using data to make work smarter, make better decisions & enjoy life

projects:
[{'title': 'Viking Austria hybris Replatform', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'description': 'For more complex sites and web applications, managing upgrades and revamps become increasingly difficult and expensive. When launching their new eCommerce website in Austria, Office Depot used, state of the art, hybris software to prepare for the future. ‚ÄúCreating a sustainable business requires moving from a catalogue focused business to an omni-channel, eCommerce led approach. The pilot in Austria is a major milestone on this journey,‚Äù said Jonathan Newman, VP eCommerce & Marketing Operations and Intl CIO at OD.

Following significant online growth and increased demand from customers, in Jan 2015, the project team started the build of the new platform together with software partner SAP hybris and implementation partner Tacit Knowledge, a Newgistics Company. Austria is the first country in which customers have started using the new and improved site.

‚ÄúThe integration of the hybris‚Äôs omni-channel capabilities has enabled OD to dramatically accelerate its time to market,‚Äù said Mark Holenstein, EVP Global Sales SAP Customer Engagement & Commerce. ‚ÄúAnd driving an aggressive deployment timeline, OD, hybris and Tacit were able to help drive significant ROI.‚Äù

‚ÄúOne of the key values that we have within OD is that the customer is at the heart of what we do‚Äù, says Newman. ‚ÄúBesides creating a new site, based on the latest technology, we‚Äôve gathered customer input to deliver a website that answered to their specific needs.‚Äù

Furthermore, delivering an enterprise level solution will often attract complexity surrounding not only the technology and the business process transformation, but also the people. ‚ÄúThe quality of our engagement from day one with OD and hybris, was something that together, we focused on to ensure the project was set up for success. Without doubt, this outstanding implementation is owed to the clearly defined partnership between our three organizations.‚Äù says Trenton Brown, GM of Newgistics / Tacit Knowledge and COO.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Mels', 'last_name': 'Wolf', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Interim Product Manager / Product Owner @ DPG Recruitment'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Jonathan', 'last_name': 'Newman', 'name': None, 'headline': 'CEO of Motive.co - 2020}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Dubai', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'company': 'Majid Al Futtaim', 'description': "Heading Product for Personalization & Search within Carrefour in the MENA region using a data driven approach to drive value for our customers and internal stakeholders.

Our current team has grown from 1 to over 20 members currently split into multiple teams these drive product innovation in terms of search based products, using personalization to drive relevance for our users. Next to this the innovation hub for trying out new things, decoupling frontend from backend, redesign of API structures, using in-store data to enrich our online relevance, transition to cloud.

As part of the Majid Al Futtaim retail offering, Carrefour currently operates over 210 stores in 15 markets across the Middle East, Africa and Asia; and will soon extend to include 38 countries in the Middle East, Central Asia, Africa and Russia, where we hold the exclusive rights to the value-filled Carrefour franchise.

Making it easier for our users to order online whether it's a quick order needed delivery in 1 hour or their weekly groceries delivered at a time convenient for them. Ensuring our customers can find their products quick and easily for the best price in the region.", 'title': 'Head of Product Discovery & Search', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 404429, 'name': 'trivago', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQFhKLgNXpe6qg/company-logo_400_400/0/1606478925574?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=HmMrcIems72c8zbbt0kR7m1RC3rLtn0x68f49ZOFMVg', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/trivagonv/', 'employees': {'start': 501, 'end': 1000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'D√ºsseldorf Area, Germany', 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'trivago', 'description': 'Within trivago I was responsible for the product development and strategy for user profiling. Ensuring we leverage data to optimize the user journey and increase the value of this data by using Machine Learning models. We mine these big data sources to gain better and more useful insights about our customers. 

Our mission became to be aware of the users intentions as early as possible into the Customer Journey. This way we could tailor the experience in a way the user feels known and is able to find the ideal hotel or apartment for the best rate with the least amount of steps. With a heavy focus on Search Optimization to drive an emotional driven qualitative search.

About the team:
In user profiling we build the best and then make it better. We build upon our website, adding features, optimizing layout and spotting bugs before our users have a chance to. We build upon our brand, ensuring the look and feel of our products are aligned and user friendly. We build upon our core content, ensuring information is accurate and of the highest quality. User Profiling is about shaping our user‚Äôs experience with trivago. Ultimately our goal is to deliver a relevant and descriptive profile of the users on trivago describing their intent, which can be used by anyone in trivago to drive relevance and personalization for our users.', 'title': 'Sr. Product Manager User Profiling', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 3114, 'name': 'Office Depot', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQHlHBwtEMQQ1g/company-logo_400_400/0/1591106118717?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=tHqLuUDcom9-H2VmF6OqfjTzdJjEZoOZTJkBMfI-RuA', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/office-depot/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'company': 'Office Depot', 'description': 'At Office Depot, we‚Äôve build the personalisation team around four pillars being Data, Process, Technology and Reporting, all to ensure commercial benefit delivery for all the actions we take whether that's focused on customer lifetime value or more short term profit. Managing a team that is dedicated in delivering value to the company using Big-Data to ensure we are relevant, and have customers being in the center of what we operate upon. Using tools to personalise both Online and Offline we use the strength of our database to let our customers feel valued by giving them what they expect; "A personalised and highly relevant experience". Hybris, Hadoop, Monetate, RichRelevance, CoreMetrics and loads of other data platforms are the core technologies used to ensure personalisation to be measured, acted upon and managed.', 'title': 'Personalisation Manager', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Venlo', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'company': 'Office Depot', 'description': '- Management and reporting from the onsite preferring tool.
- Development of a European onsite marketing strategy. 
- Management and development of all specific e-commerce data sources to obtain insight in the behaviour of customers and visitors of the European websites. 
- KPI and reporting development to support the European sales & marketing departments. 
- Usability and website testing (Multivariate testing and A/B testing) to optimize customer experience and site conversion.', 'title': 'Conversion Optimization Specialist', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Grapy.nl', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Molenhoek', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'company': 'Grapy.nl', 'description': "At Grapy I've build the webshop from the ground up having to figure out how we could ship wine using mail without bottles breaking till how to run adwords whilst suddenly google applies an adult content filter", 'title': 'Product Manager', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Wijnfort', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2003}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2003}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}}, 'company': 'Wijnfort', 'description': "As a Sommelier I was responsible for running demo's & wine tastings.
